title: Hour 2: Suns Setting?
description:
Chris Russo, Freddie Coleman, and Courtney Cronin debate if the Nets are the team under the most pressure in all of sports. The crew discuss if the Suns' championship window is closing and who will be the most exciting team in the NFL this season. Chris, Freddie, and Courtney debate if Aaron Judge will hit 61 home runs this season and if the Clippers are legitimate title contenders for next season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Is the Suns' championship window closing?
